critique: The document is a presidential order amending a previous executive order regarding special pay for enlisted members of the armed forces. It adjusts the conditions under which enlisted members are entitled to special pay when attached to ships undergoing repair and overhaul in designated foreign duty areas. The order does not directly address ideological tilt, immigration, executive power, federalism, security vs. liberty, economic regulation, or social inclusion. Therefore, the initial and revised scores are all 0.
